content: Era affascinante vedere come danzavano quelle ragazze. Non avevano nessuno spettatore tranne i raccoglitori di mele sulle scale.
translations: eng:It was charming to see how these girls danced. They had no spectators but the apple-pickers on the ladders
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by farinello (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
